actions_text.componentleveltooltip: Repeatable Actions can be performed multiple times after their cooldown period is complete.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: RitualListForManager(PlayersFaction.RitualManagerContext).Filter(IsAvailable && CanAfford && IsOnCooldown == false && (IsRepeatableRitual || (IsRepeatableRitual == false && IsComplete == false)) && LockedByPreviousInChain == false).Size

RitualListForManager(PlayersFaction.RitualManagerContext).Filter(IsAvailable && CanAfford && IsOnCooldown == false && (IsRepeatableRitual || (IsRepeatableRitual == false && IsComplete == false))).IsEmpty == false
